sentence.Network_en: Plays by Plautus and Terence are available for the student who wishes to sample their quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 要想领略其特点,可以读普劳图斯和泰兰斯的剧本.

sentence.Network_en: Not by age but by capacity is wisdom acquired ( Plautus ).
sentence.Network_cn: 智慧的获得是依靠才能而不是年龄 ( 普洛提斯 ).

means.word_mean: 1. comic dramatist of ancient Rome (253?-184 BC)

auth_sentence.content: He will quote you a nice point in the old authors, from Plato to Plautus and back again.
auth_sentence.res_content: He will quote you a nice point in the old authors, from Plato to Plautus and back again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He will quote you a nice point in the old authors, from Plato to Plautus and back again.
